0.title: Registreren - Copy 1

rules.value: Ik heb ze gelezen en ik accepteer de algemene voorwaarden.

fields.content: Add your intro message here (or remove this block completely). Read every block below and change the values to your liking.
fields.label: Foreword (readme)

fields.content: Your username has to be at least 4 characters... Add your extra message here (or remove this block completely)
fields.label: Usernameinfo

fields.content: Your e-mail address is used to activate your account.... Add your extra message here (or remove this block completely)
fields.label: Emailinfo

fields.content: A good password contains... Add your extra message here (or remove this block completely)
fields.label: Passwordinfo

fields.content: Type in your web address to be used. You may change it later using Domain Mapping so people can go to yourdomain.com.... Add your extra message here (or remove this block completely)
fields.label: Adresinfo

fields.content:
Want to upgrade?

Select your subscription below
You can always change your subscription level later.....Add your extra message here (or remove this block completely)
fields.label: SubscriptionInfo

fields.content: Your free account stays free! Add your extra message here (or remove this block completely)
fields.label: Free (no paymentbar)

fields.content: Select the length of your Basic subscription Add your extra message here (or remove this block completely)
fields.label: Basic

fields.content: Select the length of your Pro subscription Add your extra message here (or remove this block completely)
fields.label: Pro

fields.content: Select the length of your Business subscription Add your extra message here (or remove this block completely)
fields.label: Business

fields.description: You can change everything here BUT the 'values' "termmonth/term3months/termyear/"
fields.label: Period

fields.description: You can change everything here BUT the 'values' "termmonth/term3months/termyear/"
fields.label: Period

fields.description: You can change everything here BUT the 'values' "termmonth/term3months/termyear/"
fields.label: Period

fields.description: (Price without taxes) - This field can be removed but it is a visual something for your users
fields.label: Netto

fields.description: (Negative Price without taxes) - This field makes sure the price isn't doubled with the Taxes (hide this with CSS off-screen) (class: .price-hidden-calculation) - REQUIRED when you use Field 35 and 36. (Remove this field is you remove 35 OR 36 - this is 37)
fields.label: subtract

fields.description: Change the 0.21 in your calculation below for your tax amount (e.g. 0.14 for 14% taxes) Remove this field completely with Field 37 - This price is lower than "Netto" - You can do math I think ^^
fields.label: Taxes (21%)

fields.description: Terms and conditions - Remove this field if needed (will throw a warning because the field below and the "form button" in "form settings" use this field as a check". You can ignore the warning but you have to remove the conditions.)
fields.label: Terms and conditions

inputs.label: I have read them and accept the terms and conditions.

choices.text: I have read them and accept the terms and conditions.
choices.value: I have read them and accept the terms and conditions.

fields.content: It looks like you haven't filled in everything yet. Scroll to top and check all fields... Checkfields is used to inform the users that they can't sign up because they miss a field. This is a very basic option set up in "Form button" on the settings page of this form.
fields.label: Checkfields
Entry ID
fields.description: This field is hidden and can be used for invoices. You can also bind this to an account (for example as a "customer ID") but requires an additional plugin. Need it? Ask Sybre. Remove this field if you don't need it.

0.limitEntriesMessage: We have reached the limit of 1000 subscriptions today. To preserve stability of our server the subscriptions are disabled until tomorrow. See you then!

confirmations.name: Default Confirmation
confirmations.message: You've been successfully registered! Check your e-mail inbox (or spamfolder) for your activation link.
